letters.description: Explore the client's current relationship with nature, well-being goals, and readiness for immersive experiences, establishing a foundation for their journey.
Guide clients in mindful sensory exercises to awaken their connection to the natural environment and cultivate present-moment awareness.
Facilitate deeper engagement with the forest through guided invitations, encouraging clients to explore their inner landscape in response to the natural world.
Help the client integrate insights from their nature experiences into daily life, developing personalized practices and tools for ongoing connection and resilience.
Establish strategies for maintaining a consistent relationship with nature, celebrating progress, and identifying resources for continued growth and well-being.
